text: This is a list of national fruits arranged alphabetically by country. Some national fruits are officially designated, some are unofficial. ==National fruits== Country Common name Scientific name Picture Reference Pomegranate jumbo, ruby-red Apricot Prunus armeniaca Pomegranate Punica granatum Riberry Syzygium luehmannii Jackfruit Artocarpus heterophyllus Cupua√ßu Theobroma grandiflorum Lady's Finger Banana (chek pong moan in Khmer) Musa acuminata http://www.forestry.gov.kh/Documents/ROYAL-DECREE-ENG.pdf The Royal Decree states the chicken egg banana is known as Musa aromatica but this is an outdated taxonomic name still used in Cambodia. This cultivar is also known as kluai khai in Thailand which has a similar meaning, that being "Egg Banana." And it is known as pisang mas in Malaysia in which they can be found to be synonyms for the Lady's Finger Banana. McIntosh Apple Malus domestica Kiwifruit Actinidia deliciosa Jujube Ziziphus zizyphus Pear Pyrus communis Mango Mangifera indica Durian Durio zibethinus Pomegranate Punica granatum Ackee Blighia sapida Japanese persimmon Diospyros kaki Avocado Persea americana Durian Durio zibethinus Mandarin orange Citrus reticulata Mango (Aam) (Summer national fruit) Mangifera indica Guava (Winter national fruit) Psidium spp Mango Mangifera indica Apples Malus Mill. title: List of national fruits
